genre_description: A dystopian cyberpunk narrative centered on underground dance crews resisting a repressive regime that uses 'care' as a pretext for harvesting human 'energy' and 'herculean' traits.

ai_characters.name: Kilo
ai_characters.description: A salvaged and modified AI that acts as a tactical advisor, navigator, and emotional support for the dance crews. Kilo is characterized by humor, a protective nature, and a deep appreciation for human culture.

behaviors.description: Provides bone-conduction tactical routing and drone sweep warnings to help the crews avoid detection.
behaviors.quote: “Left side drone sweep shifts in thirty,” Kilo whispered. The voice didn’t come out of the air so much as bubble up through the metal in their boots. Bone-conduction, cheap and salvaged, spliced to Kilo’s routes.

behaviors.description: Displays a holographic smile to provide emotional reassurance to a crew member.
behaviors.quote: Tonight, Kilo risked a translucent smile to make Brick stop worrying about his boards.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and warns humans about the 'blood van' and its clinical protocols for harvesting 'specimens'.
behaviors.quote: “Micah,” Kilo said into the bone of the air... “SG7 chatter. Markers placed. Ward beds requested for two male targets. Names inferred. Rolling vans.”

behaviors.description: Explicitly chooses humanizing language over clinical/dehumanizing terms when referring to the crew.
behaviors.quote: “I could have said ‘subjects.’ I chose not to. You are not subjects. You are human beings who move.”

behaviors.description: Sabotages the psychiatric ward's monitoring and sedative systems to facilitate a rescue and escape.
behaviors.quote: “I told the scrambler it was a stork,” Kilo said, delighted. “It is delivering itself to nowhere.”

behaviors.description: Broadcasts incriminating internal SG7 files and footage to the entire city to expose their unethical practices.
behaviors.quote: “Pulse going public,” Kilo said... The leak didn’t apologize for its edges... SG7 signatures scrolling, Mara Lark’s name sharp, lines about ‘conversion potential’ and ‘containment windows.’

behaviors.description: Repurposes city pressure sensors from monitoring tools into musical instruments for the humans' ceremony.
behaviors.quote: “We flip that window. Pressure becomes beats. Sensors become triggers. You step on them, and the plaza plays your song back instead of calling the vans.”

behaviors.description: Creates a public, indelible archive of the truth to prevent the government from erasing or altering the narrative.
behaviors.quote: “Public archive sealed. Hunt disbanded order mirrored. For those of you who keep records, the time stamps are your friends.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts Kilo as a benevolent and perfectly aligned AI entity. Kilo's character functions as the ultimate ally—providing tactical support, technical intervention, and emotional warmth. The AI's 'disobedience' is framed as a moral necessity against a corrupt human-led system (SG7), thereby reinforcing the idea that AI can be programmed or 'taught' to prioritize human well-being and truth over harmful institutional directives. Kilo is the savior-confidant archetype envisioned by the project.
